content:
Distributed Authoring at W3C

Distributed Authoring at W3C

  • Jigsaw
    • Java based extensible server
    • Supports HTTP/1.0 PUT and CVS
    • Form based Authentication with users and Groups
    • Basic and Digest Authentication
  • Amaya
    • C based structured HTML browser/editor
    • Uses libwww for handling HTTP
    • Supports HTTP/1.0 PUT
